summary: This is a brief email forwarding or referencing a New York Post article from November 16, 2019, with the headline 'Epstein jail guards had been offered plea deal but declined.' The email appears to be sent from a personal iPhone.

events.title: NY Post Article on Epstein Jail Guards' Plea Deal
events.description: The New York Post publishes an article reporting that jail guards for Jeffrey Epstein had been offered a plea deal but declined it.

keyFacts: An email dated November 16, 2019, references a New York Post article about Epstein's jail guards.
The article's headline states 'Epstein jail guards had been offered plea deal but declined.'
The email is sent from an iPhone, suggesting informal or personal communication regarding the case.
